projects.title: Eezy-lang
projects.description: A toy programming language written in Rust that targets JVM runtime. Features include custom syntax, lexer, parser, and bytecode generation for seamless Java interoperability.

projects.title: Datum ORM
projects.description: A fully-managed ORM for Golang that feels like a breeze. Handles migrations, schema management, and query building for SQL databases with an intuitive API.
